trans-unit.source: Displays editable text information in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Viser informasjon om redigerbare tekst i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewTextBoxCell class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> used to display a single string of editable text-based information.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataGridViewTextBoxCell er en spesiell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>brukes til å vise en enkelt streng redigerbare tekstbaserte informasjon.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: The currently selected DataGridViewTextBoxCell hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl> control in which the user can edit the cell's value (assuming the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A> property of the DataGridViewTextBoxCell is set to `false`).
trans-unit.target: De valgte DataGridViewTextBoxCell vertene en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl>kontrollen som brukeren kan redigere celleverdien (forutsatt at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A>for DataGridViewTextBoxCell er satt til `false`).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>kolonnetypen som er spesielle for lagring av cellene av denne typen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is initialized to a new DataGridViewTextBoxCell.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>initialiseres til en ny DataGridViewTextBoxCell.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To pattern the cells within a column after an existing DataGridViewTextBoxCell, set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to the cell to use as a pattern.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil mønsteret cellene i en kolonne etter en eksisterende DataGridViewTextBoxCell, setter du kolonnen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen celle som skal brukes som et mønster.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper relatert til cellen for kolonnen er sikkerhetsgrupper for navnet på samme måte-egenskapene for malen celle.

trans-unit.source: Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change.
trans-unit.target: Endring av egenskapsverdiene for malen cellen påvirker bare celler basert på mal som er lagt til etter at endringen.

trans-unit.source: Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Endring av cellen-relaterte egenskapsverdiene i kolonnen, imidlertid oppdaterer malen cellen og alle celler i kolonnen, og oppdatere kolonnevisningen om nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en nøyaktig kopi av denne cellen.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Overstyr klone-metoden når du avledes fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>og legge til nye egenskaper utledede klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer det klonede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Removes the cell's editing control from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner cellen for redigering kontrollere fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter typen for den formaterte verdien som er knyttet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The type of the underlying formatted value is always <xref:System.String> because a text box only handles text information
trans-unit.target: Typen for den underliggende formaterte verdien er alltid <xref:System.String>fordi en tekstboks behandler bare tekstinformasjon</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the <xref:System.String> type in all cases.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer den <xref:System.String>typen i alle tilfellene.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and cell style.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det avgrensende rektangelet som omslutter den cellen området innhold, som beregnes ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> og stil for celler.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Grafikk konteksten for cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som skal brukes til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som bounds celleinnholdet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's error icon, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det avgrensende rektangelet som omslutter den cellen Feilikonet Hvis én vises.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Grafikk konteksten for cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som skal brukes til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's error icon, if one is displayed; otherwise, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som bounds den cellen ikon, hvis det vises; ellers, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Beregner den foretrukne størrelsen på cellen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å tegne cellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på cellen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte radindeksen av cellen.

trans-unit.source: The cell's maximum allowable size.
trans-unit.target: Den cellen maksimal tillatt størrelse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer den foretrukne størrelsen på cellen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Attaches and initializes the hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Knytter og initialiserer vertsbaserte kontroll for redigering.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeEditingControl method initializes the hosted editing control as described in the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeEditingControl initialiserer den vertsbaserte redigering kontrollen som beskrevet i grunntallet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InitializeEditingControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For every invocation, this method also sets the following visual attributes of the editing control: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: For hver aktivering angir denne metoden også følgende visual attributtene for kontrollen for redigering:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A>egenskap er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> properties are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>Og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>egenskapene til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Text%2A> property is set to the `initialFormattedValue` parameter.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Text%2A>Er satt til den `initialFormattedValue` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row being edited.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som redigeres.

trans-unit.source: The initial value to be displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: Startverdien som skal vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A cell style that is used to determine the appearance of the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: En cellestilen som brukes til å fastsette hvordan den vertsbaserte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Determines if edit mode should be started based on the given key.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om redigeringsmodus skal starte basert på den angitte nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>, the control uses this method to determine whether a key other than F2 that is pressed by the user while this cell has focus will cause the cell to enter edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode>, kontrollen bruker denne metoden til å bestemme om cellen Angi redigeringsmodus fører til en nøkkel enn F2 trykkes av brukeren mens denne cellen er i fokus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` if the e parameter indicates an ordinary data-entry key (such as a letter, number, punctuation mark, or the SPACE key) unmodified by ALT or CTRL, excluding SHIFT+SPACE, which is used by the control for selection purposes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer `true` Hvis e-parameteren angir en vanlig dataregistrering nøkkel (for eksempel en bokstav, tall, skilletegn eller mellomrom-nøkkelen) unmodified av ALT eller CTRL, unntatt SKIFT + mellomrom, som brukes av kontrollen utvalget formålene.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Handling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [standard tastatur og mus behandling i Windows Forms DataGridView-kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that represents the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> som representerer nøkkelen som ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if edit mode should be started; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Rediger modus skal starte; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir maksimum antall tegn som kan angis i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: The MaxInputLength property does not affect the length of text entered programmatically through the cell's value or through cell formatting.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MaxInputLength påvirker ikke lengden på teksten angitt programmatisk via celleverdien eller formatering.

trans-unit.source: It affects only what the user can input and edit.
trans-unit.target: Den påvirker bare hva brukeren kan angi og redigere.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.MaxInputLength%2A> property of the owning column also sets the MaxInputLength property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.MaxInputLength%2A>-egenskapen til kolonnen eier angir også egenskapen MaxInputLength for hver celle i kolonnen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.MaxInputLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box; the default value is 32767.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall tegn som kan angis i tekstboksen. Standardverdien er 32767.

trans-unit.source: The value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> when the selection cursor moves onto a cell.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> når markøren flyttes til en celle.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er lik den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Kalles i samme tilfeller der en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>denne hendelsen oppstår, men den ikke heve hendelsen faktisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row entered by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden ble angitt av musen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell was entered as a result of a mouse click; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen ble angitt som et resultat av et museklikk; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> when the mouse leaves a cell.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> når musen forlater en celle.

trans-unit.source: Resets the instance's click state to ensure that leaving then re-entering the cell requires a double click to start edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller den forekomsten Klikk tilstand for å sikre at avslutter inn cellen på nytt krever et Dobbeltklikk for å starte redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er lik den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Kalles i samme tilfeller der en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=fullName>denne hendelsen oppstår, men den ikke heve hendelsen faktisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row the mouse has left.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden har forlatt musen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell was left as a result of a mouse click; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis cellen ble etterlatt som et resultat av en mus Klikk; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> when the mouse leaves a cell.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> når musen forlater en celle.

trans-unit.source: OnMouseClick determines whether the mouse click is part of a double click that starts an edit session.
trans-unit.target: OnMouseClick bestemmer om klikket er en del av et Dobbeltklikk som starter en redigeringsøkten.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er lik den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Kalles i samme tilfeller der en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick?displayProperty=fullName>denne hendelsen oppstår, men den ikke heve hendelsen faktisk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Maler gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å fargemerknader i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer området i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som må tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som inneholder grensene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som blir malt.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen i cellen som males.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> verdier som angir tilstanden til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Dataene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som blir malt.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: De formaterte dataene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som blir malt.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: En feilmelding som er knyttet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om cellen formatering og stil.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som inneholder Kantlinjestilene for celle som males.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> verdier som angir hvilke deler av cellen må males.

trans-unit.source: Sets the location and size of the editing control hosted by a cell in the DataGridView control.
trans-unit.target: Angir plasseringen og størrelsen kontrollens redigering vert en celle i DataGridView-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to have the control placed as specified by the other arguments; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow the control to place itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>kontroll plasseres som er angitt av det andre argumentet; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> vil tillate at kontrollen skal plasseres seg selv.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the size; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow the control to size itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Angi størrelse. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> vil tillate at kontrollen skal skaleres seg selv.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the cell bounds.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som definerer celle grensene.

trans-unit.source: The area that will be used to paint the editing control.
trans-unit.target: Området som skal brukes til å fargemerknader kontroll for redigering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen i cellen som redigeres.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a vertical border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>legge til en loddrett kantlinje til cellen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a horizontal border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>legge til en vannrett kantlinje til cellen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
